metadata.title: CVE-2017-13165 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the kernel file system. Product:Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID A-31269937.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
